title: [Feature request]  WebAuthn redirection
author: webabox
body_snippet:
Description: WebAuthn redirection allows WebAuthn requests to be redirected from a remote session to a local device, enabling secure, in-session passwordless authentication. This feature is crucial for improving security and user experience in remote desktop environments.

Benefits:

Enhanced security through passwordless authentication.
Improved user experience by leveraging existing authentication methods.
Compatibility with Windows Hello for Business and FIDO security keys like Yubikey.
